column1:
['
IX. 계열회사 등에 관한 사항
가. 계열회사 명칭당사는 2018년 12월 31일 현재 당사를 제외하고 43개의 계열회사를 소유하고있습니다. 현재 계열회사는 모두 비상장 회사이며, 회사의 약칭 및 명칭은 아래와 같습니다.1. Hanon Beijing: Hanon Systems (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
2. Hanon Dalian: Hanon Systems (Dalian) Co., Ltd.
3. Hanon Jinan: Halla Visteon Climate Control (Jinan) Co., Ltd.
4. Hanon Shanghai: Hanon Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.
5. Hanon Chongqing: Hanon Systems (Chongqing) Co., Ltd.
6. Hanon Nanchang: Hanon Systems (Nanchang) Co., Ltd.7. Hanon Nanjing: Hanon Jie Xi Si Systems (Nanjing) Co., Ltd.8. Hanon Yancheng: Hanon Systems (Yancheng) Co., Ltd.9. Hanon New Chongqing: Chongqing Hanon Systems Co., Ltd10. CSG JV: Chongqing Hanon Jianshe Automotive Thermal Systems Co. Ltd11. FHAC JV: FAWER Hanon Automotive Components (Changchun)  \xa0 \xa0 Company \xa0Ltd. 12. HASI(구 VASI): Hanon Automotive Systems India Private Ltd.
13. Hanon Bhiwadi: Hanon Climate Systems India Private Limited
14. Hanon Japan: Hanon Systems Japan Ltd.
15. Hanon Thailand: Hanon Systems (Thailand) Co. Ltd.
16. Hanon Slovakia: Hanon Systems Slovakia s.r.o.
17. Hanon Turkey:Hanon Automotive Climate Sys. Manufacturing Industrial and  \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Commercial Co.
18. Hanon Portugal: Hanon Systems Portugal, S.A.
19. Hanon Autopal Service: Hanon Systems Autopal Services, s.r.o.
20. Hanon Autopal: Hanon Systems Autopal, s.r.o.
21. Hanon Charleville: Hanon Systems Charleville SAS
22. Hanon Hungary: Hanon Systems Hungary Kft
23. Hanon UK: Hanon Systems UK Limited
24. Hanon Deutschland: Hanon Systems Deutschland GmbH25. Hanon Southern Germany: Hanon Systems Southern Germany GmbH
26.Hanon Netherlands: Hanon Systems Netherlands Cooperatief U.A.
27. Hanon Russia: Hanon Systems Rus. LLC
28. Hanon Alabama: Hanon Systems Alabama Corp.
29. Hanon USA: Hanon Systems USA, LLC
30. Hanon Canada: Hanon Systems Canada Inc.
31. Hanon Coclisa: Coclisa, S.A. de C.V.
32. Hanon Mexicana: Climate Systems Mexicana, S.A. de C.V.
33. Hanon Brazil: Hanon Systems Climatizacoes do Brasil Industria e Comercio  \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0Ltda.34. Hanon South Africa: Hanon Systems South Africa(PTY) Ltd35. Bonaire: Bonaire Automotive Electrical System Co., Ltd
36. FHTS: FAWER Hanon Thermal Systems (Changchun) Company Ltd.
37. JCS: Japan Climate Systems Corporation38. BBHS: Beijing BHAP Hanon Systems Co., Ltd.
39. Hanon EFP Corporation : Hanon Systems EFP Corporation
40. Hanon EFP Deutschland GmbH : Hanon Systems EFP Deutschland GmbH41. Hanon EFP Mexico : EFP Operations Mexicana, S.A. de C.V.
42. Hanon EFP Mexico Service : \xa0Climate Systems Services Mexicana EFP, S.A. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0de C.V.
43. Hanon Auto Parts Hungary: \xa0Gibbs-Hungary Die Casting Ipari Termelo Kft.
Hanon New Chongqing은 Hanon Beijing이 83.25% 소유하고 있습니다.Hanon \xa0EFP Deutschland GmbH, Hanon EFP Mexico, Hanon EFP Mexico Service위 세 회사는 Hanon Systems EFP Corporation이 100% 소유하고 있습니다.나. 계열회사간 계통도
계열회사 등의 상호지분 현황
